Now You’re Cooking is a comprehensive cooking companion software designed for foodies, chefs, and anyone who loves to cook. Developed by Mastercook, the software is user-friendly and provides users with a wide range of features to help them manage their meals, cookbooks, shopping lists, and nutrition information.

## Features

1. Recipe Management

Now You’re Cooking offers a powerful recipe management system that enables users to organize their recipes into categories, add notes, and attach images. Moreover, the software also allows users to import recipes from other sources and manage ingredient substitutions with ease.

2. Meal Planning

Meal planning is an essential part of healthy eating, and Now You’re Cooking makes it easier than ever before. With its meal planning feature, users can plan their meals for the week, generate shopping lists, and create menus for special occasions.

3. Nutrition Tracking

For those who are health-conscious, Now You’re Cooking offers a nutrition tracking feature that allows users to track their daily intake of calories, fats, carbohydrates, and protein.

4. Cooking Tools

The software includes a range of cooking tools, such as timers, conversion calculators, and cooking tips to help users with their cooking needs.

5. Shopping List

Now You’re Cooking generates shopping lists for users based on the ingredients in their recipes, making it easier to organize grocery shopping.

## User Interface

The user interface of Now You’re Cooking is straightforward and easy to use. It offers a range of customizable features that allow users to tailor the software to their needs. The software offers various types of views, such as recipe view, ingredient view, and nutrition view, to make it easier for users to manage their recipes and ingredients.

## Conclusion

Overall, Now You’re Cooking is an excellent comprehensive cooking software designed for foodies, chefs, and anyone who loves to cook. The software offers a wide range of features that make meal planning, recipe management, and grocery shopping effortless. With its user-friendly interface and customizable features, it’s a great investment for any cook looking to step up their game.
